total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the row that contains the number 6 in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the row that contains the number 3 in the input grid.
Q3: Identify the numbers that are adjacent to the number 6 in the identified row.
Q4: Identify the numbers that are adjacent to the number 3 in the identified row.
Q5: Create a new grid that extends the numbers adjacent to the number 6 to the right until they reach the end of the grid.
Q6: Create a new grid that extends the numbers adjacent to the number 3 downwards until they reach the end of the grid.
Q7: Combine the two new grids created in Q5 and Q6 to form the final output grid.

Q6: Determine how the pattern of numbers in the row containing the number 3 is transformed in the output grid.
Q7: Apply the transformation rules identified in Q5 and Q6 to the input grid to generate the output grid.
